original_text: Then the commanders of the Philistines came out to battle, and as often as they came out David had more success than all the servants of Saul, so that his name was highly esteemed.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람들의 방백들이 싸우러 나오면 그들이 나올 때마다 다윗이 사울의 모든 신하보다 더 지혜롭게 행하매 이에 그의 이름이 심히 귀하게 되니라

sentences.original_text: Then the commanders of the Philistines came out to battle
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 블레셋 사람의 장관들이 싸우러 나왔다

sentences.original_text: and as often as they came out
David had more success than all the servants of Saul
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗은 사울의 모든 신하들보다 더 큰 성공을 거두었다

sentences.original_text: so that his name was highly esteemed.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그의 이름은 매우 존귀하게 되었다
